SEARCH
Module JBubbleBobble
Package game.model.enemies

Class EnemyManager

java.lang.Object
game.model.enemies.EnemyManager
public class EnemyManager extends Object
Manages the collection of enemies and lasers in the game. The EnemyManager class is responsible for adding, removing, and updating enemies and lasers, as well as providing access to these entities.

This class uses CopyOnWriteArrayList to store the enemies and lasers, which ensures thread-safe operations when modifying the lists.

    • getHazards

      public List<MovingEntity> getHazards()
      Returns a combined list of all enemies and lasers, treating them as hazards.

      The returned list contains all entities that pose a danger to the player, combining both enemies and lasers into a single list.

      Returns:
      a List of MovingEntity objects representing all hazards
